headline: GE Vernova Stock Fell With Latest Call to Sell
summary: Shares of the highflying power-generation equipment company  GE Vernova  are the latest example.  Analysts at Rothschild cut their rating to Sell from Hold and kept a $475 price target for the shares, calling them “materially overvalued,” according to stock-rating aggregators.  At current levels, GE Vernova stock trades for about 51 times the earnings expected for next year, according to FactSet, up from about 40 times a year ago.
